titleStmt.title: A succinct philosophicall declaration of the nature of clymactericall yeeres, occasioned by the death of Queene Elizabeth. VVritten by T:VV
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Valentine Sims] for Thomas Thorpe, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crane, by Walter Burre,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Also issued as part 2 of his: The passions of the minde: London, 1604.
Reproduction of the original formerly in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (since deaccessioned).

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crane
